title: Regions defined by cubic and tangent functions part - c

content.description: Let R and S be the regions in the first quadrant shown in the figure above. The region R is bounded by the x-axis and the graphs of y = 2 - x3 and y = tan x. The region S is bounded by the y-axis and the graphs of y = 2 - x3 and y tan x.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when S is revolved about the x-axis.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when S is revolved about the x-axis.

topic.text: 8.11: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around the x- or y-Axis

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
